Summary: Seen 4 UFOs over highway by my house and in the sky towards Henderson.
divs: sighting detailsi was waiting for my shuttle bus to college as i noticed a bright reddish bright light somewhat blinking but thought it was a airplane. its 5am and we are heading down the highway now and i noticed a really small starlike thing moving and blinking like crazy then i seen two more of those and thought i was just seeing things. at that moment i saw a huge diamond black\gray object it had 5 red lights under it on each corner and one in the middle and 2 white lights on oppisite ends of the diamond object i was directly under it at this point i was frozen with shock at what i saw. there was another person with me including the driver but the other person was asleep and the driver was not paying attention. now recently i have seen 7 red orange orbs flying over vegas a few days ago. after my close enconter i was having an anxiety attack when i got to the school i had to go straight back home because i could not stop shaking from what ive seen it scared me . you can choose not to believe me, but i know what i saw i can decribe every single detail of the bottom of the huge object. anyway as i was waiting for my ride back home i continued to watch the huge object hover the go up slowly and slowly headed towards the southern mountains. following along i seen the starlike objects flying crazy blinking white light till the dissappeared.
